a-life-of-charm-and-grace 161009896609 "2017-05-24 04:27:32 GMT" http://a-life-of-charm-and-grace.tumblr.com/post/161009896609/chronically-caffeinic "chronically-caffeinic: a-life-of-charm-and-grace: Please pray for the Philippines. My stepmother is Filipina and much of her family still lives there. I’m not sure exactly what’s going on because it’s all very chaotic and President Duterte simply likes to have control of everything.  Is there any update on Marawi that you’ve heard? Islamic State Militants had taken over a hospital last I saw..?  I know that Duterte declared martial law. And just for information sake
column2: it’s not actually ISIS that took control
column3: it’s a group claiming to be allied with them - the Maute. The whole city is blacked out and there are gunmen everywhere. I also know they are burning down Catholic Churches. " False text

a-life-of-charm-and-grace 161008628474 "2017-05-24 03:45:30 GMT" http://a-life-of-charm-and-grace.tumblr.com/post/161008628474/gaze-on-jesus-i-am-the-utter-poverty-of-god-i "gaze-on-jesus: “I am the utter poverty of God. I am His emptiness
column6: the self-emptying of God in me is the fullness of grace. A love for God that knows no reason because He is the fullness of grace. A love for God that knows no reason because He is God
column8: a love for God as personal. Love for all
column10: is the fruit and manifestation of love for God - peace and satisfaction. Forgetfulness of worldly pleasure
column11: selflessness in the love for God
column12: channeling all passion and emotion into the love for God” [Thomas Merton - Journal entry May 16

a-life-of-charm-and-grace 160932751549 "2017-05-22 02:49:18 GMT" http://a-life-of-charm-and-grace.tumblr.com/post/160932751549/by-grace-of-god-one-of-the-common-complaints "by-grace-of-god:  One of the common complaints about the Catholic Church is that the Church is all about rules.  “Is it alright for your husband or the man you are dating to date other women? Is it a ‘rule’ that they don’t date other women? It’s not really a rule. It’s a way of life if you love someone. Rules in the Catholic understanding are patterns for life
column3: a way of showing honor and respect to other people. If you love others
column4: that’s what you do! All the commandments are simply about ways of loving.” - Archbishop Charles Chaput " False text
